# dormancyR

`dormancyR` aims to provide alternatives to common chill models used in horticulture to compute chill metrics in deciduous fruit tree orchards. The package produces outputs compatible with the `chillR` package [@R-chillR]. It also contains functions to handle historic and updated weather data downloaded from Chilean ([Center for Climate and Resilience Research](<https://www.cr2.cl>) and [Agromet INIA](<https://www.agromet.cl/datos-historicos>)) and German databases ([Climate Data Center](<https://cdc.dwd.de/portal/>)).

`dormancyR` was developed for a scientific manuscript DOI...
